website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed shoe that has the classic look users expect from Converse.
pros: Color stays bright and bold over time
cons: Fit can be an issue as they tend to run long and narrow

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these shoes the product picture depicted the all white monochromatic converse- what was delivered to me however was the regular leather converse with the blue and red stripes on the shoes. Not all white as pictured. Not to mention the quality of the shoe delivered was iffy and I’m not sure if it was genuine product.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Buy from the original website so you will not be disappointed because the pricing will still be the same when ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white on white Converse shoe NOT the Converse with the red/blue strips! I would advise against buying this shoe as you would not receive the shoe that you think you are ordering. The shoe was also too large for my feet. Buy from the original website so you will not be disappointed because the pricing will still be the same when everything is said and done.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: When I ordered these shoes the photo showed an all ...
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these shoes the photo showed an all white converse with no red or blue stripe. That was not what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The back is very stiff and too high!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they’re leather and can be easily cleaned. I hate that I have two painful blisters on the backs of my heels because they are pretty high and very stiff. I wear Chuck Taylors all the time and that has never been an issue! I’m afraid to wear them again as that first time was so painful by the end of my teaching day!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The leather is perfect if your a messy and clumsy person like me ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is perfect if your a messy and clumsy person like me and cant keep anything white. It does rub on the eyelets so they can get a bit dark but a nice scrub will clean the shoes right up. I am a size 9 and they fit perfect. A bit stiffer than the regular fabric ones but after a few wears they are just as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: they are leather chucks
customer_reviews.text: Completed my small linited collection of classic chuck colors. Best in my opinion to buy the leather ones since price wise they are about the same as the canvas ones. They are chucks they fit like chucks look like chucks. only difference they are leather and should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Damionus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe, just love it
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for, wanted an entirely white sneakers, this came with racing stripes, though when I purchased it, the picture showed it to be all white. Amazing shoe, just love it, but I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: May May

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got these for vacation and love the leather, they won't get as dirty as my canvas pair. Came on time (since I decided to order two days before my trip🤦🏽‍♀️) great selection of sizes too!
customer_reviews.author: DarlieAH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and a classic look
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe with a classic Converse look that is sharp. Recommend keeping them as clean as possible (remove smudges and scuffs ASAP using a sneaker cleaner). Great shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Texas-Ex NYC Guy

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is a classic, and in leather it ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a classic, and in leather it looks even bttr! Size runs large as usual w Converse. But even more in the leather model. I wear an 8 in reg canvas chucks, however had to go dwn a half a size on the leather model, I ordered 7.5 and it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking/feeling shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I do love the way these shoes look....sleek and clean. The fit for me is perfect in my regular shoe size . I'm did not answer the question about good arch support because I couldn't see an arch in the shoe, but the shoes are very very comfortable (I have a high arch). If my job was standing on my feet for 10-12 hours a day, I might choose a different shoe because of my high arches.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lee

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks great but was but was way too big
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great but was but was way too big. I am a size 14 and knew that would be too big (because converse run big as it is) so I bought a 13 and that was still too big. But I'm sure a 12 will fit perfectly. So I'm going to have to return it and get the size I need. That's the only thing about ordering online that I do not like. I can't try things on like I can in a store. Bow I have to go through the long process of returning and buying anew.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Shoe color not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a plain white leather shoe and it came with the red and blue sole. The description was not accurate. Otherwise the shoe is a nice shoe. I would have given it 5 stars if the description was correct on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I am not conviced it is a 100% original product ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not conviced it is a 100% original product... It stained from the day 1 because of a red adhesive pouring from the joints of the fabric and rubber and now my shoes are not white but kind of pink...
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Herrera Ospino

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they were too big, I normally wear a 9.5 and I ordered a 9 and they looked like clown shoes on my feet. They fit more like 11's on my feet. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 👌👌👌
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this has been a great product. The quality, color, everything. I loved 'em also my wife....but is very hard when you buy something for other person, specially shoes. They were too large, but was my fault. I'm very happy with everything, also the delivery was done many days earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Maisel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, just run really big
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, just run really big. I ordered 1/2 size smaller than I wear from the reviews. Needed another 1/2 size smaller. Was going to send back but don't have a size 9 1/2. They work and I don't look like a clown! Jim
customer_reviews.author: JWR

customer_reviews.title: Leather white chucks
customer_reviews.text: So got these because I wanted the leather in white. I think these will be easier to keep clean. Got my usual size but its slightly big.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Tate

customer_reviews.title: I feel like i have clown shoes on
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7. I ordrered a size 7 based on the reviews. It's about a half size to big. I wish they would have the option to exchange them I would in a heart beat for a size 6 1/2. I feel like i have clown shoes on. Other than that, great shoe, great look
customer_reviews.author: miss April

customer_reviews.title: White leather Converse just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They are just a bit big but I put an insole in them and they are fine I love them easy to clean so I don't have to walk around with dirty white sneakers and their Converse I couldn't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Muzikmaidn

customer_reviews.title: Fix the first pic to match the shoes....
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look and fit great...but....the main(first) picture of the shoes are not what I received. The pic shows the shoes with a black stripe going around them but when I got the shoes the stripe is red. Then I looked at the other pix and it shows a red stripe. I definitely wanted the black striped shoes but don’t wanna go thru the hassle of returning them. They still look good and I’m still gonna wear them...but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Breeding

customer_reviews.title: I bought size 11 Mens/13 Womens and instead received size 13 Mens
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all, shoes were wayyyy off from the listing in size.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Anthony Furio

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great WHITE LEATHER converse shoe, Sooooo by mistake I ordered ✌ pair and couldn't cancel time. Soooooo they arrived today and are so nice I'm keeping them both👟🤗
customer_reviews.author: Kimskreations🍃

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as usual
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting another pair of chucks. These are awesome and the leather is high quality, as usual. Can't really beat the deal on these. One thing to maybe keep in mind is that I normally wear a 9-9/12 for most other brands. I normally get chucks in a size 8 1/2, If my memory serves me right, but I think these might be a little roomy still. If I were to do it over again I might order an 8. I still love them. If you arnt familiar with ordering chucks remember to order them a 1/2 - 1 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: B Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because the product picture shows all white converse. I received white converse with red and blue striping. Not really a big deal but I only bought them because o thought they were completely white. Other than that I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size to large and very stiff at first.
customer_reviews.text: Like other stated they are shown as all white yet they can with the red and black "racing stripe" and I would say they run a half size to big.
customer_reviews.author: hzleyes70

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a half size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the big side for my size but I’m okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Isai C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Not sure I would purchase in leather ...
customer_reviews.text: Being that it is leather, the tongue is stiffer and if you fully lace the show, the tongue gouges my ankle and causes discomfort. I leave the last eyelet unlaced and that alleviates the issue. Have worn them since September. Nice shoe. Not sure I would purchase in leather again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Albright

customer_reviews.title: You May Not Get What You're Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Sad because my order didn't match the picture at all. I wanted all the all white, but got pair with the blue and red stripes (should have read all of the reviews before purchasing). They still look great, but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: A little bit too big
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that converse makes leather shoes like a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe.. it runs big and I had no time to return it for the half size less, I wear 11 but should have gotten 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chucks so decided to go with a leather pair and I absolutely love them. I highly recommend the leather as they are lower maintenance if you prefer your sneakers not to look too grungy.
customer_reviews.author: S. scott-young

customer_reviews.title: hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard tie finding the leather sneakers. These were a great find ad price.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Shoe looks long and narrow!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe tongue is too long! The shoe feels long, but it fits fine! I have notice other women who have them on they look long and narrow! I do like them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R Rose

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I was quite irritated to have received something other than what i ordered which was an all white pair. Instead, i received white with blue and red stripes. More annoying is the fact that it's an international shipment. Returning it will probably cost more than purchasing it did.
customer_reviews.author: Erelu

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice shoe. Material and look is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shoe. Material and look is great! I ordered according to chart (I wear a women's 9), but these were WAY TOO BIG.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love them. But as an "over fifty something" gal ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong... I love them. But as an "over fifty something" gal I need more support. These are great for times when I'm only wearing them for a few hours but I love the way they look!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Peters

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable. I bought them for travel
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable. I bought them for travel. They do run a bit large and I had to return my first pair for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: CEB

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoe pictured
customer_reviews.text: This post is misleading. I wanted the all white leather shoes... but instead, I received the white shoes with the blue and red stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: the quilted finish is a superb touch and maker the ...
customer_reviews.text: the quilted finish is a superb touch and maker the unique shade of red REALLY POP!ive maybe 50 pairs of chucks ..these are already one of my favourites...worn sparingly of course!!!
customer_reviews.author: the X man

customer_reviews.title: Classic Chuck Style in a clean white leather
customer_reviews.text: I love 'em. Classic Chuck style, but in a nice white leather that keeps the dirt and grime away much better than the canvas ones. I think everyone knows to order a 1/2 size smaller than you would typically wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bee

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is very nice, the size is not correct
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very nice, the size is not correct, I am usually 8 in women, and so I asked for it and it is giant, I had to ask for a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great. I wear a 8 1/2 regularly and ordered a 7 1/2. So order a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Angee Worth

customer_reviews.title: More stars coming
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large!, I had to return, but I ordering another pair a size smaller! I wear 11.5 womans.
customer_reviews.author: C.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It nice but buy 1 size smaller than yr actual
customer_reviews.author: candice dougan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, color, fit and quality of these Converse. Being leather I think they'll last forever with me. My 14 year old son loves them also and wants one really bad. Anyone can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Love that this shoe is available in white leather...much easier to clean than canvas.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: I really like the white leather
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shoe. I really like the white leather. Fit as expected. I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: Dee in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, just bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, just bigger than expected. I ordered size 7 which is the size I normally wear and they're way too big.
customer_reviews.author: theo

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Love the sneakers but the size chart was all wrong The sneakers I ordered was huge !
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW FAVORITE SHOES!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE SHOES!!!!! I get so many compliments every time I wear them. They are very easy to wipe off which is why I bought them because I could not keep my white canvas clean. They are definitely my go-to casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Chavers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product picture did not match what I received. Bait and switch
customer_reviews.author: Ash Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worn shoes! Dirty inside and out.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived dirty inside and out. Pet hair and stains on the inside of each sneaker and stains and wear and tear on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mona K.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied: I received the wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes delivered is different from the shoes displayed on the page. I ordered white leather and I got something different
customer_reviews.author: Treanna

customer_reviews.title: Converse
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my son! They arrived on time as expected. Can't wait to give them to him!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ember

customer_reviews.title: Men's and women's shoes should be men sizes for men ...
customer_reviews.text: Men's and women's shoes should be men sizes for men and women sizes for women. Believe it or not we are different sexes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get them immediately, if not sooner ;)
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Love them from the moment I put them on. Comfy, good fit from day one. Way easier to clean than denim sneakers. Very happy with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Converse quality has fallen
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact same leather classic converse last year, and the tongue that hits your ankle was much softer. The one I just bought here, is very stiff. It pierces the back of my ankle. Overall looks amazing but the quality and comfort of the shoes has significantly been reduced
customer_reviews.author: Safwan Choudhury

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and very well made- maybe a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and very well made- maybe a half size bigger but I think if I went from 11 to a 10.5 it would be a little snug. Overall, really love them!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. As expected. Good product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but tongue is stiff and presses against my foot. Otherwise these are great looking with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: JT Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, great item, I got it as I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Leather; That was a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They feel a little big but I think this is just b/c the leather doesn't give as much as canvas. It doesn't effect the fit enough to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect made.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect made...somewhat large so i suggest order half size smaller if younwant ur feet tight...if not its all good...good material and good feeling in wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Goce Ristoski

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong size. Size that is stated on website is incorrect. 6.5 women’s/4.5 men’s is what is stated. I receive 8.5 women’s/ 6.5 men’s
customer_reviews.author: Bee84

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: The leather shoes are so much better than canvas. They stay looking clean and fresh longer. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: MDB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my niece. I was told se loves them and fit right on
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend LOVES them, they are the best shoes ever made
customer_reviews.author: Sviatoslav

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe if you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Always been attracted to leather shoes, but does get some wrinkles because of feet size
customer_reviews.author: Andre Nevado

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORIGINAL CONVERSE
customer_reviews.text: Not worth taking the a chance.Runs ONE size too big.Also this is not ORIGINAL converse shoe.I have a couple of pairs and can tell that it’s not genuine.It has no convers tag which comes with all legit converse sneakers.No size at bottom of shoe-this is also present in all old school chucks.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Wenani

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe in leather
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoe in leather.... bought them for my niece before my goofy sister paid $70+.....worth $50. absolutely not worth $70+....
customer_reviews.author: R Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes good leather looking very good on my feet i recommended these
customer_reviews.author: Damon Survine

customer_reviews.title: They aren’t all white!
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve read more the reviews The picture is incorrect the all white leather is not true they sent the all white but with red and blue stripes Fix the pictures because they are causing problems like this
customer_reviews.author: Fernando soto

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These are classic sneakers. As with most converse sneakers they run a half size large and there's virtually no arch support, but that nothing that can't be fixed with an insole.
customer_reviews.author: great snapchat

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great but they ran way to big. In fact, my husband ended up taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and very quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: 1. Shoes came very fast. 2. Shoes for perfectly 3. Shoes look great. Great quality. Good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Maiwes1

customer_reviews.title: These are my absolute favorite converse, extremely easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite converse, extremely easy to clean, and comfortable. After reading many reviews, I decided to go down several sizes, due to the shoes being unisex. I am so glad I did! the shoes are perfect, and way better than the cloth version!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Minirth

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn’t match product received
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that the shoe I received didn’t match the picture. I wanted all white monochromatic and received shoes with blue and red stripes on the outsole. After checking reviews, I’m not the first to post this...should have been corrected by now.
customer_reviews.author: Faris Caleca

customer_reviews.title: Tested and true
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 in Converse - could have ordered these in an 8. Stall the best.
customer_reviews.author: CaitB

customer_reviews.title: I love wearing the Chuck Taylor Leather Converse
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing the Chuck Taylor Leather Converse, they always look nice with a pair of jeans and feel great. I prefer the leather to cloth, especially in the white.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: leather is better than canvas...no real worries about cleaning the white.
customer_reviews.author: ASergent

customer_reviews.title: Get half a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: In the leather I had to order half a size smaller that I would normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: They are Chucks, Leather Chucks
customer_reviews.text: Chuck Taylors are exactly what they appear to be. They are a simple no frills sneaker. They have no arch support, are narrow, and don't have any cushion. If you are buying these shoes you should already know that. The leather these are made of is good quality. Just like all Chucks the tongue won't stay in place. They are hard to keep clean (c'mon they're white!). Bottom line? They're leather Chuck Taylors what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Zilla

customer_reviews.title: I love converse and the leather ones are fantastic I work ...
customer_reviews.text: I love converse and the leather ones are fantastic I work as a CNA and I am on my feet all day so getting the addition of arch support is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COLOR OF SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Color of shoes is very nice and thank you seller bcs ship it to Malaysia.. 😊😇
customer_reviews.author: Norhartini

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size down from his normal size and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the leather and these sneakers always been cool for any casual wear
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garza

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the all white shoe and I received the ones with the red and blue stripes. I had to return it and try and find the right product.

customer_reviews.title: Converse Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, but they were exactly what she expected. She new exactly what she wanted and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Mamajo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I felt it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I felt it was a little larger than my normal size. I would recommend going a size down.

customer_reviews.title: ... them on yet but no doubt they will be perfect unless the size doesn't fit her just right guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Special request for Christmas gift for my daughter-n-law so she hasn't seen them or tried them on yet but no doubt they will be perfect unless the size doesn't fit her just right guess I will have to wait and see about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: i order this shoes Because i had other converse but on canvas........ these with leather and white color are really nice thank you fast delivery too..

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my boyfriend. He inserts an ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend. He inserts an arch support for added comfort. He loves them. This is his 2nd or third pair. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Get so many compliments. The white leather is easier to keep clean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but when you want it, you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mónica0711

customer_reviews.title: Love my converse!
customer_reviews.text: These are some really nice converse & I love the fact I can wipe them clean. They run a half size larger for me but I love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just received my white leather converse and I am in love with them. I ordered a black pair in leather as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade of a classic.
customer_reviews.text: Cool leather version of a classic. What's great is I can wipe them down and keep them cleaner than the canvas kind and they will certainly last longer.
customer_reviews.author: jerbs

customer_reviews.title: They are great because are of leather and look like the original
customer_reviews.text: They are great because are of leather and look like the original model
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected however I would recommend to order half size smaller than what you normally do. It worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Chuck Taylor All Star 2019 Seasonal Low Top Sneaker
product_meta.description: The laidback legend since ’57. The Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top sneaker is the iconic low-cut. Essential elements like an Ortholite insole and canvas upper keep it comfortable. You got it.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
